name: Gargolyan
description: A massive stone gargoyle guardian that protects the entrance to Hell Castle with its intimidating presence and raw strength.

abilities.name: Armor Shredding
abilities.description: Deals 340 + (100% of Gargolyan's Dodge Chance scaling) Physical Damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: For 2 turns, all damage intended for allies is redirected to Gargolyan. Gargolyan can still dodge these attacks.

abilities.name: Magma Pulse
abilities.description: Shoots 5 magma bursts at random enemies, each dealing 155 + (125% Magical Damage) as magical damage.

passive.name: Unstoppable
passive.description: Gargolyan cannot be stunned. Any stun effects applied to it are immediately negated.
